title: Finding bugs is harder than fixing them
content: We give organizations access to a diverse network of pre-vetted Bug Hunters, whose wide range of skill sets help you find vulnerabilities that internal teams may overlook.

features.title: Why This Matters
features.text: Crowdsourcing bug bounty programs provides a cost-effective and scalable framework for security assessments, strengthening your organization's security posture.

features.title: Public vs. Private Programs
features.text: Public programs are open to the entire Cyberbay community, while private programs are invitation-only. Contact us to discuss which type of program is best for you.
